Articles.Content: hey mega how are the KATEC ships going?

3 ships, max 350 tons. (For all ships combined)

If you agree, then I'll have a go.

Haven't got any good ships over 60 tons. Working on one now, though.

hey mega how are the KATEC ships going?

The missile you gave me has a problem, when I try to place it, it makes the sound but doesn't place. Even worse is that when I try to move the missile afterwards the entire ship moves instead. Then I lose about half an hour of work because I try to delete the missile but it deletes the entire hull instead.

In the meantime, I can send you the new Royal Sovereign class tomorrow afternoon and you can use it as you see fit.

- - - Updated - - -

Haven't got any good ships over 60 tons. Working on one now, though.

I'm looking to test my 200 ton ship, my 68 ton ship and my 63 ton ship.

yeah, having some trouble with the XIV-Xs, they keep reseting themselves as landers... but this time i think you actually killed it so good job.

yeah, having some trouble with the XIV-Xs, they keep reseting themselves as landers... but this time i think you actually killed it so good job.

How do you stop them counting as landers? I'm having that problem with mine as well. :/

How do you stop them counting as landers? I'm having that problem with mine as well. :/

Go to the pod/probe core "in charge", and right-click on it, then click "rename", then reclassify it as a ship.

The missile you gave me has a problem, when I try to place it, it makes the sound but doesn't place. Even worse is that when I try to move the missile afterwards the entire ship moves instead. Then I lose about half an hour of work because I try to delete the missile but it deletes the entire hull instead.

In the meantime, I can send you the new Royal Sovereign class tomorrow afternoon and you can use it as you see fit.

- - - Updated - - -

I'm looking to test my 200 ton ship, my 68 ton ship and my 63 ton ship.

This is the symmetry bug I'm talking about. DO NOT CTRL-Z, it just makes things worse.

This is the symmetry bug I'm talking about. DO NOT CTRL-Z, it just makes things worse.

That bug has wrecked many of my builds, don't attach missiles (or anything made in the VAB) using symmetry in the SPH.

On another note, I just completed my Eagle-class Battlecruiser. 68 tons and almost 500 parts, this vessel has 4 anti-ship missiles and tons of armor. It survived, with no damage, two missile attacks. These are the same missiles that shredded the Drek.
Double-post pls ignore

yeah, having some trouble with the XIV-Xs, they keep reseting themselves as landers... but this time i think you actually killed it so good job.

I also noticed a bug where I can click on the tab that shows all the fuel levels and what not
Start at 0:36 for zekes reaction

That bug has wrecked many of my builds, don't attach missiles (or anything made in the VAB) using symmetry in the SPH.

On another note, I just completed my Eagle-class Battlecruiser. 68 tons and almost 500 parts, this vessel has 4 anti-ship missiles and tons of armor. It survived, with no damage, two missile attacks. These are the same missiles that shredded the Drek.

http://i.imgur.com/TTDKCcS.png

It's more about placing a subassembly with internal symmetry, with symmetry. Guaranteed to wreck your file. And sometimes Ctrl-Z works, if you do it until before you clicked wrong the first time. The thing is, it'll show you the kind of mess you were creating with each "failed click": you just didn't think they were being placed, they were being placed alright, and taking nodes form the rest of the ship and stuff.

Rune. Let's hope the editor rework takes care of those file-wrecking bugs!

After seeing the videos of early BF4 "Final Stand" gameplay... I'm temped to try and make a stock hover-tank.

Perhaps using a basic jet w/ thrust limiter on, and some strong RCS thrusters?
What. IS. THIS. Actual battles in KSP? After I finally comprehend this I think I will try to make some war-vehicles.

Challange accepted. 1 .5 meter missile took out the engines, then two 1.25 missiles ripped her to peices. Thankfully, both her prize missiles came off and I was able to dock them to Tod, making the net torpeto loss 0. Scratch two kills for Tod.

I also found the problem with the XIV-X... part clipping. That darn middle engine. I'll have to tear the rear off the ship and redo it now... the whole -X series has proven a dissapointment; not enough fuel, middle engine wobbles about 40 degrees on either side, and the main part is easyo break... i guess it's back to the XXVII or the XIV-V.
